content:
# I have successfully harvested 10 units of iron ore, and my inventory now includes the Stone Furnace, coal, stones, and iron ore. 
# The next step is to use the Stone Furnace to smelt the iron ore into iron plates.

# 13. **Smelt Iron Ore into Iron Plates.**
# I will use the Stone Furnace to smelt the iron ore. Each iron ore typically produces one iron plate.
smelted_iron_quantity = smelt_resource(Prototype.StoneFurnace, Prototype.IronOre, quantity=10)  # Smelting all 10 iron ore.

# 14. **Check the inventory after smelting to confirm the iron plates have been produced.**
print(f"Inventory after smelting: {inspect_inventory()}")  # Display updated inventory.
